meanings.definition: The action of one object coming forcibly into contact with another.
meanings.sent1: The impact of the ball hitting the wall was loud.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake had a significant impact on the buildings.
meanings.sent3: The impact of the banana slipping on the peel was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The impact of her words on him was like a tidal wave of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the car crash was so intense, it shook the entire neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The impact of the rain on the flowers was refreshing.
meanings.sent2: His speech had a positive impact on the audience.
meanings.sent3: The impact of the cat's meow on the dog was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The impact of her smile on him was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the music was so powerful, it brought tears to their eyes.
